GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ath11k: fix netdev open race

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 307ce58270b3b50ca21cfcc910568429b06803f7, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit d5c65159f2895379e11ca13f62feabe93278985d. For more details please see the references link.
